data.name: Reliance Industries Ltd.
data.description:
Reliance Industries Ltd. is the largest producer of petrochemicals in India and amongst the top ten in the world.

It is our constant endeavor to harness the power of chemistry to deliver product solutions and experiences for our customers across a wide range of applications: personal hygiene, automotive, bedding, textiles, and packaging, among others.

Our product portfolio is completely aligned to global megatrends and evolving consumer demand. As part of our B2B2C market-focused approach, we offer end-to-end support across the value chain through cutting-edge R&D, technical support, assured product quality, consistent supply, and marketing initiatives.

Reliance creates more than just products - we are driven by the conviction that the complicated science of all that we do is ultimately responsible for the everyday happiness of millions of people, positively influencing and enhancing lifestyles. We call it "Chemistry for Smiles."

data.name: R|Elan
data.description: R|Elan™, the next-gen fabric has been created from specially engineered fibres and yarns using the cutting-edge technological expertise, state-of-the-art R&D and the robust testing systems. These smart fabrics provide solutions to emerging consumer needs and it is the most sought-after fabric by renowned domestic and global brands, retailers and apparel manufacturers. In short, R|Elan™ is Fabric 2.0 – fabric of the future. R|Elan™ has unique eco-friendly fabrics that help apparel brands create special sustainable apparel, thereby enabling the ‘green fashion’ movement across the industry. RIL infuses new-age functionality with its innovative fabric range to meet the growing demand for high performance apparels. RIL brings in the technological edge to infuse new-age functionality, which ensures to come up with stunning innovative fabrics to meet the growing demand for high-performance apparels.The product portfolio includes products under categories like:Sustainability (GreenGold & EcoGold)Wellness (FeelFresh)Performance (Kooltex, AirTherm, AllClima)Aesthetics (SuperFeel, Cotluk, SuperBlack)

data.name: Recron® for Hygiene
data.description: Recron Non woven polyester staple fiber is engineered to suit the processing needs of most modern spunlace products using dry-laid or wet-laid carded or air-laid web. These fibers are best suitable on high speed cards, low foaming on hydro-entanglement and can be processed either alone or in blends. They are ideal for producing roll goods for use in various end-uses such as wipes, medical, hygiene, FemCare, home and industrial applications.AttributesLow foamingEnables easy hydro-entanglement﻿Versatility for use as 100% or with blendsSpecial 'Bio-Burden' test ensuring zero contamination for hygiene applicationOptimum finish to ensure low water recycling costSpecial NamesRecron® RegularRecron® Super-SoftRecron® Hi-AbsorbRecron® Hi-CoverRecron® Antimony-FreeRecron® Hi-ProtectionRecron® Hi-ShrinkRecron® Optical BrightRecron® Black

data.name: Relpet
data.description: Relpet® is widely used to make bottles, APET sheets, strappings and monofilaments. Relpet® is available in various viscosities, starting from 0.76 to 0.84, suitable for a wide range of applications.

data.name: Recron® for Automotive
data.description: Recron® Automotive polyester staple fibers are specially designed to meet the toughest specifications of the user industry. These fibers are produced with special emphasis on critical parameters like tensile strength, elongation, modulus, shrinkage, etc. to ensure optimal performance of end products.Attributes:Recron® UV Stable for protection from harmful UV radiation.Excellent Abrasion & Anti Pilling Resistant.Lightweight nonwoven component.Higher yield in downstream process.Special Names:Recron® Non-woven SolutionsRecron® EcoD for AutomotiveRecron®Fiberfill Low shrinkageRecron® MaxCover

data.name: Recron® Fiberfill
data.description: Reliance Industries Limited offers a comprehensive range of Recron® Fibrefill for sleep and comfort products, furniture and home textile applications. data.description: Relpet® is widely used to make bottles, APET sheets, strappings and monofilaments. Relpet® is available in various viscosities, starting from 0.76 to 0.84, suitable for a wide range of applications.

data.name: R|Elan™ FreeFlow
data.description: R|Elan™ FreeFlow fabrics provides fluidity and enables creation of exquisite and elegant dresses and tops for women. They help accentuate the beauty of wearer through phenomenal drape and fall. Womenswear fabric such as georgette, Chiffon, satin, brasso etc made possible through R|Elan™ FreeFlow technology

data.name: Recron® Fiberfill Virgin Hollow Conjugate 'Hi-loft'
data.description: Product Attributes:More than 90% bounce back>26% hollowness (15D) with perfect round hollow cross-section,~15% increase in loft without weight and loft with weight as compared to conventional hollow fiberfill,Same level of resilience with 10-15% less filling quantity than conventional,Superior loft translates into firm support to the back and spine - making it an excellent choice for back-sleepersHuman-Ecological requirements of the Standard 100 by Oeko-Tex established in Apendix-6 for Baby Articles.Hypoallergenic & odor free.Special Name:Recron Conjugate 'Hi-Bulk'Recron Conjugate 'Regular'Recron Conjugate 'Soft Touch'Denier Range: 15, 12, 7, 4, 3Cut Length:  32, 51, 64,76Speciality:  Siliconised/ Non-Siliconised/ Slick/ Anti-Microbial

data.name: Recron® Fiberfill Low Shrinkage
data.description: Product Attributes:Low shrinkage : <2% (180⁰C, 30 minutes),Better dimensional stability.Higher yield in downstream processSpecial Name: Recron® Fiberfill Low-shrinkDenier Range: 3Cut Length: 51, 64,76Speciality: Siliconised/ Non-Siliconised

data.name: Recron® Fiberfill AirTherm
data.description: Discover Recron® AirTherm, a multi-faceted innovative product combining warmth, comfort, durability and sustainability - all into a single entity. It enables outstanding ‘Ball and Wadding Insulation' in modern clothing - thermal wear and jackets; and sleep solutions — comforters, quilts, sleeping bags, that provide exceptional TOG/ CLO value, 10-15% higher over conventional solid fine fibres.Say goodbye to heavy winter wear and quilts!Product Attributes:A ‘downright’ blend of warmth and lightness for Thermal Wears and sleep solutionsOutstanding Ball and Wadding Insulation to jackets/quilts,Higher TOG/CLO value by 10-15% over conventional solid fine fibersMore warmth with less weight; thanks to it's >16% hollowness10-15% better 'Softness Index' than that of traditional fiberfill,Made from Pre-Consumer wasteGRS and OEKO-Tex Certified.Special Name: Recron® AirThermDenier Range:  1.8Cut Length:   51,64,76Speciality:  Siliconised

data.description: Product Attributes:Made from Pre Consumer Industrial Waste15-20% higher loft with same fill quantity than conventional fiberfill,Excellent ResilienceUnique Chemical Recycling technology enhances performance in terms of bulk and color equivalent to Virgin fibrefill.Super white compared with regular recycled materialsGRS CertifiedSpecial Name:Recron Green 'Hi-Bulk'Recron Green 'Regular'Denier Range: 15, 7, 6Cut Length: 32, 51, 64, 76Speciality: Siliconised/ Non-Siliconised/ Slick/ Anti-Microbial

It also has excellent strength and durability.Also available is R|Elan™ GreenGold Cotluk - made from 100% used PET bottles

data.name: Recron® Fiberfill Memory
data.description: Recron® Memory Fibrefill has a unique characteristic named 'Slow-Release Effect’ that allows the pillows to adapt according to the user's neck and head position in a homogenous fluid movement. These pillows are the perfect alternative for the undesirably heat retaining dense memory foam pillows. Recron® Memory Fibrefill is easy to maintain and has hypoallergenic & odour-free properties.They are ideal for travel pillows.Product Attributes:An unique pressure point release nature, it releives Neck, Shoulder and Back Pain by allowing muscles to relax.A perfect alternative for the undesirable heat retaining dense memory foam.Odourless and allergen free.Ideal for premimum pillows for ergonomic support and travel pillows.Made from Pre-Consumer wasteGRS and OEKO-Tex Certified.Special Name: Recron® Memory FibrefillDenier Range:  MicroCut Length:  22, 24,32Speciality:  Siliconised

data.name: Recron® Fiberfill HEXaREL
data.description: Product Attributes:Designed to retain body heat. HEXaREL based products enhances 10-30% TOG/Clo Value than regular products.Thermoregulation: Conducts heat very efficiently; performance measured in Qmax rating 0.1 (w/cm2).Neutralises bacteria, ensuring control of malodorProtects from virus and fungiExhibits fabulous Anti-Static propertiesEnhances Mosquito repellencyMade from Pre-Consumer wasteGRS and OEKO-Tex CertifiedSpecial Names: HEXaREL FiberfillDenier Range: 1.8, 3, 6, 15Speciality: Hollow/Solid

data.name: Recron® Fiberfill Green Hollow Conjugate 'Eco-friendly'
data.description: Based on the principles of ‘Reduce, Reuse and Recycle’, Recron® Green Conjugate Fibrefill helps in maintaining the 'eco-balance’ of the Earth. Made from 100% Post-consumer PET bottles, Recron® Green Conjugate Fibrefill doesn’t compromise on look, touch and comfort. It complies with the internationally recognised Global Recycle Standard [GRS) meeting with some of the most stringent environmental criteria for being a green fibre. With best-in-class hollowness of >30%, Recron® Green Conjugate Fibrefill offers exceptional fill power and resilience.Product Attributes:Production of Green Fiberfill emits 5 times less carbon emission compared to virgin fiberfillMade from 100% Post Consumer PET Bottles'Eco-Balance' with Sustainable solutionGRS and OEKO-Tex Certified>30% hollowness (15D) with perfect circular cross-section15-20% higher loft with same fill quantity than conventional fiberfillSpecial Name:Recron Green Conjugate 'Hi-Bulk'Recron Green Conjugate 'Regular'Recron Green Conjugate 'Soft Touch'Denier Range: 15, 7, 4Cut Length:  32, 51, 64,76Speciality:  Siliconised/ Non-Siliconised/ Slick/ Anti-Microbial

data.name: Recron® Fiberfill Green EcoGold
data.description: Product Attributes:Pace of Nature : Degrades at rates similar to natural fibers like wool.‘Eco-balance’ with ‘Recycle, Reduce & Reuse’ biodegradable, excellent Bouncy fibrefill with excellent recovery.Enables activation of biomimetic biodegradation process in certain conditions (landfill, sea water, etc.)GRS and OEKO-Tex Certified>30% hollowness (15D) with perfect circular cross-section,15-20% higher loft with same fill quantity than conventional fiberfill.Special Name:Recron Green Conjugate 'Hi-Bulk'Recron Green Conjugate 'Regular'Recron Green Conjugate 'Soft Touch'Denier Range: 15, 7, 4Cut Length:  32, 51, 64,76Speciality: Siliconised/ Non-Siliconised/ Slick/ Anti-Microbial

data.name: Recron® Fiberfill Green Hollow 'Eco-friendly'
data.description: Product Attributes:Made from Pre Consumer Industrial Waste15-20% higher loft with same fill quantity than conventional fiberfill,Excellent ResilienceUnique Chemical Recycling technology enhances performance in terms of bulk and color equivalent to Virgin fibrefill.Super white compared with regular recycled materialsGRS CertifiedSpecial Name:Recron Green 'Hi-Bulk'Recron Green 'Regular'Denier Range: 15, 7, 6Cut Length: 32, 51, 64, 76Speciality: Siliconised/ Non-Siliconised/ Slick/ Anti-Microbial

data.description: Product Attributes:More than 90% bounce back>26% hollowness (15D) with perfect round hollow cross-section,~15% increase in loft without weight and loft with weight as compared to conventional hollow fiberfill,Same level of resilience with 10-15% less filling quantity than conventional,Superior loft translates into firm support to the back and spine - making it an excellent choice for back-sleepersHuman-Ecological requirements of the Standard 100 by Oeko-Tex established in Apendix-6 for Baby Articles.Hypoallergenic & odor free.Special Name:Recron Conjugate 'Hi-Bulk'Recron Conjugate 'Regular'Recron Conjugate 'Soft Touch'Denier Range: 15, 12, 7, 4, 3Cut Length:  32, 51, 64,76Speciality:  Siliconised/ Non-Siliconised/ Slick/ Anti-Microbial

data.name: Recron® Fiberfill SuperSoft
data.description: Product Attributes:A true down alternative with extra Soft feel and feathery touch to the bedding collectionHigher TOG value at lower GSM enables light weight jackets, quilts, comforters, duvets etc.Unlike natural down and feather; Recron Supersoft prevents lump formation and are 'Odour-Free'Sustainable category made from Pre-Consumer wasteGRS Certification for Sustainable CategorySpecial Name: Recron® Fiberfill SuperSoftDenier Range: 0.9, 1.0,1.5, 3Cut Length: 22, 32, 51Speciality: Siliconised / Slick

data.name: Recron® Fiberfill AirLite
data.description: Soft! Light! Lofty! Meet Recron® AirLite - the perfect sleep solution for pillows and cushions.Recron® AirLite's fibres are intrinsically fine and hollow, making it the ‘true alternative to Down’. Its ‘Softness Index’ is better than traditional fibrefill by 10-15%, while its fill power is 10 15% enhanced over comparable solid fibrefill. And, it's sustainable too thanks to its unique Dupont SMI technology.Recron® AirLite products demonstrate exceptional resilience and recovery during long duration usage, thereby ensuring the durability of the product.Product Attributes:Made from Pre-Consumer wasteGRS and OEKO-Tex CertifiedRecron Airlite is intrinsically fine and hollowA true alternative to Down10-15% better 'Softness Index' than that of traditional fiberfillExceptional resilience and recovery over a longer period, ensures durability of the product>15% hollowness compared to conventional fine fibersSpecial Name: Recron® AirLiteDenier Range:  1.8Cut Length:  22, 32, 51Speciality:  Non-Siliconised

data.name: Recron® Fiberfill AirTherm
data.description: Discover Recron® AirTherm, a multi-faceted innovative product combining warmth, comfort, durability and sustainability - all into a single entity. It enables outstanding ‘Ball and Wadding Insulation' in modern clothing - thermal wear and jackets; and sleep solutions — comforters, quilts, sleeping bags, that provide exceptional TOG/ CLO value, 10-15% higher over conventional solid fine fibres.Say goodbye to heavy winter wear and quilts!Product Attributes:A ‘downright’ blend of warmth and lightness for Thermal Wears and sleep solutionsOutstanding Ball and Wadding Insulation to jackets/quilts,Higher TOG/CLO value by 10-15% over conventional solid fine fibersMore warmth with less weight; thanks to it's >16% hollowness10-15% better 'Softness Index' than that of traditional fiberfill,Made from Pre-Consumer wasteGRS and OEKO-Tex Certified.Special Name: Recron® AirThermDenier Range:  1.8Cut Length:   51,64,76Speciality:  Siliconised

data.name: Recron® Fiberfill Hi-Protect 'Protect with Comfort'
data.description: Product Attributes:Retains antimicrobial properties even after 20 washesAnti-odor and anti-fungal properties as per ASTM E2149-13a test standardControls a wide range of Gram-Negative & Gram-Positive bacteria and fungi. Also controls dust-mites which are known to cause respiratory disease like Asthma.Skin friendlySpecial Name: Recron® Hi-Protect FiberfillDenier Range:   Micro, 1.5, 4, 6, 7, 15Cut Length:   32, 51,64,76Speciality:   Anti-Microbial

data.name: Recron® Fiberfill High Shrinkage
data.description: Product Attributes:High shrinkage: Has > 20% boiling water shrinkage.When blended with regular non-shrinkable fibre, the resultant yarn will shrink by 16-17% (like acrylic yarn) during bulking.Value addition to needle punch felt: increase bonding by interlocking and reduces low melt percentage resulting improved properties like loft, feel, strength etc.GRS certifiedHigh dyeability: Deep dyed & dark shade makes it more visually appealingHigh bulk: Superior bulk and light weight, provides super wicking, quick drying and warmth, with a wool-like feel.Special Name: Recron® Fiberfill High-ShrinkDenier Range:   1.8, 3.5, 5.0Cut Length: 38,51, 64,76,108, VCLSpeciality: Non-Siliconised

data.name: Recron® Fiberfill Low Shrinkage
data.description: Product Attributes:Low shrinkage : <2% (180⁰C, 30 minutes),Better dimensional stability.Higher yield in downstream processSpecial Name: Recron® Fiberfill Low-shrinkDenier Range: 3Cut Length: 51, 64,76Speciality: Siliconised/ Non-Siliconised

data.name: Reliance Industries Ltd.
data.description:
Reliance Industries Ltd. is the largest producer of petrochemicals in India and amongst the top ten in the world.

It is our constant endeavor to harness the power of chemistry to deliver product solutions and experiences for our customers across a wide range of applications: personal hygiene, automotive, bedding, textiles, and packaging, among others.

Our product portfolio is completely aligned to global megatrends and evolving consumer demand. As part of our B2B2C market-focused approach, we offer end-to-end support across the value chain through cutting-edge R&D, technical support, assured product quality, consistent supply, and marketing initiatives.

Reliance creates more than just products - we are driven by the conviction that the complicated science of all that we do is ultimately responsible for the everyday happiness of millions of people, positively influencing and enhancing lifestyles. We call it "Chemistry for Smiles."

TOP_BAR.SEARCH_PLACEHOLDER: Search by chemistry, function, application and more

HOME_PAGE.TITLE: Chemicals Marketplace - ingredients & raw materials - Knowde

EXPERTS.HEADING: Message Our Experts For a Fast Response

HOME_PAGE.DESCRIPTION: Knowde is the first marketplace for chemicals, polymers and ingredients. Our leading-edge digital capabilities connect thousands of suppliers and customers every day.

UNILEVER.QUOTE_CONTENT: Knowde is especially helping us with newer, smaller but up-and-coming suppliers that are useful to have on our radar especially in the field of Sustainability.

CURIO.QUOTE_CONTENT: Purchasing ingredients should always be this easy!

DIAMOND.QUOTE_BY: Diamond Overseas Trading Co. | Technical Manager
DIAMOND.QUOTE_CONTENT: It's an amazing website to search for chemicals and more!

PERSONAL_CARE.TITLE: Healthy Beauty by DSM
PERSONAL_CARE.DESCRIPTION: DSM has taken an in-depth look at the growing enthusiasm for medical beauty to make the best skin care ingredients for non-invasive solutions.

BEAUTY.TITLE: Beauty by Lubrizol Life Science
BEAUTY.DESCRIPTION: LLS partners with customers to develop, manufacture and market a broad range of differentiated ingredients for skin care, hair care and skin cleansing.

PEAS.TITLE: Plant Proteins by Roquette
PEAS.DESCRIPTION: The products made with NUTRALYS® don't just nourish us today – they help us feed ourselves tomorrow too. Together, we are changing how the planet eats.

WHY_KNOWDE.HEADING: Interact with over 8,000 suppliers, browse their catalogs, access documents and download starter formulations.

SECTION_1.HEADING: Instant access to the most comprehensive product catalog
SECTION_1.DESCRIPTION: Browse, search and filter the world's largest catalog of chemicals, ingredients and polymers.

SECTION_2.HEADING: Talk directly to suppliers' experts
SECTION_2.DESCRIPTION: Ask technical product questions, talk to a sales rep and inquire about pricing.

SECTION_3.HEADING: Order samples, request documents, and get quotes
SECTION_3.DESCRIPTION: Knowde concierge will handle all the details and ensure your requests are handled faster than ever.

WHY_CHEMISTRY.HEADING: Driving the world's most impactful industry forward.

SECTION_1.DESCRIPTION: At Knowde, we believe in the power of chemistry. We believe that easy and efficient access to information and raw materials enables you to work smarter and faster so you can continue to make a rich global impact.

SECTION_2.DESCRIPTION: Your innovations have decreased the carbon footprint of the automotive industry, imagined a sustainable agricultural future, developed alternative, biodegradable packaging materials, and changed the landscape of connectivity forever – to name a few. This is only the beginning.
SECTION_2.HEADING: We can't wait to see what you create with Knowde.

ROW.TITLE: Knowde Software

0.TITLE: Knowde for Suppliers

1.TITLE: Knowde for Distributors
1.DESCRIPTION: Delight both your principals and your customers with a modern online experience that differentiates your brand and accelerates business growth.

0.TITLE: Master Data Management Platform
0.DESCRIPTION: Digital transformation begins with clean data. Knowde organizes your structured product data in a matter of weeks.

1.TITLE: Customer Experience Application

2.TITLE: Knowde Marketplace

TOOLTIP.TITLE: Why is this important?
TOOLTIP.PARAGRAPH_I: Knowde is a B2B platform where customers and suppliers conduct business online. Using a business email address demonstrates the legitimacy of your company and commercial intent, and you are much more likely to receive responses to your requests.
TOOLTIP.PARAGRAPH_II: You can still use a personal email but you may have additional company verification steps before getting access to all of {companyName}'s features.

PAYWALL.TITLE_1: Get new products to market faster with a free Knowde Marketplace account
PAYWALL.DESCRIPTION_1: Gain instant access to our marketplace of over 250,000 chemicals, ingredients and polymers from 8,000 suppliers. Browse, search, and filter to quickly compare products, find information, request documents, order samples, and get quotes directly from suppliers.
PAYWALL.TITLE_2: The fastest way to find the right raw materials for your products
PAYWALL.DESCRIPTION_2: Search and filter over 250,000 chemicals, ingredients and polymers, access documents and download starter formulations. Interact with over 8,000 suppliers whose representatives are ready to help. Sign up for a free Knowde Marketplace account today.
PAYWALL.DESCRIPTION_3: Create a free account to gain instant access to our marketplace of over 250,000 products and their documents.
